name: Dictionary Offline
description: Dictionary offline multilingual translation dictionary. This electronic dictionary helps you to complete the worlds major languages mutual translations. All of this work is in the offline state to achieve.   Key features: * Mono-lingual dictionaries for English, German, and Italian. * Mutli-lingual dictionaries between many language pairs. * Fast translate! (See translations as you type!) * Dictionaries stored on SD card (works offline!) * Save queried translations to text file on SD card for later reference.   Supported translations: * English - Afrikaans * English - Albanian * English - Arabic * English - Armenian * English - Azeri * English - Basque * English - Belarusian * English - Bengali * English - Bosnian * English -
